title: Preparation and Overview guide for Azure trainings and certifications
description: Cracking the Azure. Preparation and Overview guide for Azure trainings and certifications

title: Learn creating Angular Build Azure CI Pipeline
description: If you want to create Build definition for Angular project in Azure DevOps

title: Terraform Azure Cognitive Service
description: Terraform Module for deploying a Azure Cognitive Service (QNA)

title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is a managed Kubernetes service that lets you quickly deploy and manage clusters.

title: Azure ExpressRoute fundamentals
description: ExpressRoute lets you extend your on-premises networks into the Microsoft cloud over a private connection with the help of a connectivity provider. With ExpressRoute, you can establish connections to Microsoft cloud services, such as Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365.

title: Azure VPN Gateway fundamentals
description: VPNs use an encrypted tunnel within another network. They're typically deployed to connect two or more trusted private networks to one another over an untrusted network (typically the public internet). Traffic is encrypted while traveling over the untrusted network to prevent eavesdropping or other attacks.

title: Azure Virtual Network settings
description: You can create and configure Azure virtual networks from the Azure portal, Azure PowerShell, Azure CLI, Azure Cloud Shell or an ARM template.

title: Explore Azure networking services
description: Suppose your company, Tailwind Traders, has migrated some applications to the cloud and is architecting new ones. The servers that host Tailwind Traders' customer and product data are based in Silicon Valley. Your company also has several branch offices located in different geographic regions. As part of your migration strategy, your company needs to determine the correct approach to configure its network infrastructure.

title: Linux On Azure
description: This comprehensive learning path reviews deployment and management of Linux on Azure. Learn about cloud computing concepts, Linux IaaS and PaaS solutions and benefits and Azure cloud services. Discover how to migrate and extend your Linux-based workloads on Azure with improved scalability, security, and privacy.

title: Apa itu Azure Active Directory?
description: Azure AD, adalah sistem di Microsoft Azure yang memungkinkan manajemen identitas untuk mengonfigurasi aksesibilitas pengguna dan grup ke layanan dan sumber daya.

title: Connect Azure assets to Microsoft Defender for Cloud
description: Resource protection in Microsoft Defender for Cloud can be automatically configured with autoprovisioning or may be manually deployed.

title: What is Azure Route Server?
description: Azure Route Server simplifies dynamic routing between your network virtual appliance (NVA) and your virtual network.

title: How to become an MCT
description: Microsoft Certified Trainers are professionals who instruct other professionals who want to become a Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP). They are the only authorized individuals to provide official training for Microsoft Certification exams.

title: Introduction to Azure Firewall :fire:
description: Azure Firewall is a cloud-native and intelligent network firewall security service that provides the best of breed threat protection for your cloud workloads running in Azure.

title: What is Microsoft 365 ? :large_blue_diamond:
description: Microsoft 365 is designed to help you achieve more with innovative Office apps, intelligent cloud services, and world-class security.

title: HTB - Blue :large_blue_diamond: :space_invader:
description: The path for the user/system owning is clear as blue! One of the fatest machines that players got 'first blood' in a couple of minutes. Get a detailed walkthrough of Blue machine in Hack The Box, which is also a OSCP like windows machine.
